wikipedia_page.main: James Leuzinger (born 5 May 1982) is a British alpine skier. He competed in the men's slalom at the 2006 Winter Olympics.

response: Winterbottom is the uncle of Swiss-born James Leuzinger, who represented Great Britain at the 2006 Winter Olympics.

link_mentions.page: Great Britain at the 2006 Winter Olympics
response: Noel Baxter, Alain Baxter and James Leuzinger were the men's representatives in the slalom, and the Baxters also raced in the giant slalom. Finlay Mickel and Roger Cruickshank were the men's downhill and super-G skiers.

link_mentions.page: Alpine skiing at the 2006 Winter Olympics – Men's slalom

response: *James Leuzinger (born 1982), Swiss born British alpine skier
